content.description: Sit start with hands matched on a horizontal edge. From there, with pasted feet, pull up to a right hand gaston, bump up to a pinch-edge, follow to a left hand edge with the left hand, gain and match on the great edge at the lip, reach back to an edge on top, and mantel atop the boulder.
content.protection: A pair of pads. The landing is very good though.
content.location:
It climbs the south face of Quiltwork just left of

Ley Lines

and shares the same finish.

content.description: Stand start with your choice of edge. From there, gain a the right hand vertical sidepull feature, use some fine edges with left hand, bring the feet up, switch the left hands to a great left hand undercling-pinch, bump the right hand up the sidepull, move the feet up again, then negotiate the topout, and mantel atop the boulder.
content.protection: A pad will do. The landing is perfect.
content.location: It climbs the northeast slab of Quiltwork.

content.description: Sit start with a left hand inverted pinch and a right hand knob. From there, place a right hand heel on a small edge, pull up to a right hand edge, match next to it, stand up to a right hand sloper-pinch, gain and match on a great edge at the lip, reach back to an edge, and press out the mantel.
content.protection: A pair of pads. The landing is perfect though.
content.location:
It climbs the south face of Quiltwork, just to the right of

Brewed By The Past

.
